column1: The '''Mounds of Mundburg''' was a place near [[Anduin]] where the dead of the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields
column2: Battle of Pelennor Fields]] were buried. The name of the mounds is the translation of [[Minas Tirith]] into the [[Rohirric]] equivalent ''[[Mundburg]]''. The battle and the mounds were celebrated in the ''[[Song of the Mounds of Mundburg]]''.<ref>{{RK
